name: vulnerable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 able to be easily physically or mentally hurt, influenced, or attacked: I felt very vulnerable, standing there without any clothes on. It is on economic policy that the government is most vulnerable. Tourists are more vulnerable to attack, because they do not know which areas of the city to avoid. Opposite
invulnerable
